title: Fabulous!
review:
Good phone.... 
Pros- beautiful display, awesome battery back up, clean ui, with decent specs, good stylus usage and quick view case
Cons- camera auto focus has issues(front camera is really good though with flash), stylus usage could have been made even better with bit more options and finger print scanner could have been given
Overall a good phone for people who want stylus experience at a lower price!!!:-)

title: Utterly Disappointed
review:
A BIG PUNK AND WASTE PHONE .
Don't buy this phone .
I bought it last week it was really punk and waste . dont be fool and don't listen to others. 
I used it for 1 week . its working very slow . you can not active 2 app together because phone will work very slow . some employee's in LG brunch said me that stylus 2 plus is very very punk and so many people wanted to give back the phone . please dont buy ...
I listened to some people and bought it . please you dont repeat my big mistake .
Then i asked to LG brunch to change the phone after 3 days they said me just 10000 rs. I bought it 22000 rs .
its not supported OTG.
Speaker is very low sound.

title: an excellent phone
review: I have been using this phone for 2 months and i would say that it is way better that Samsung, Redmi, Azus, Gionee , the brands I owned previously. One good thing is that it is completely made in India, but still reflects quality. The stylus experience is good, we could scribble notes even in off screen mode, Camera is good, the phone is light weight and looks premium. The battery could have been better.  The specs are good there is no lag or haggling at any point of time. Nano Sims dual, fast charging, good display. Overall an excellent experience no doubt. Go for it.

title: Good choice
review:
I am a typical Samsung user,since S.guru to S6 edge plus.Used many models in between.I owned this Stylus 2 plus by 1 week.Using frequently.Not any issue except the back camera which has been sayed a 16mp,but not perfect on this quality.Overall phone performance is v good,in this budget.Display is nice,should not be compared with super amoleds,bcoz it's a real colours and resolutions.Stylus use made me a fantastic creative.Sound quality is too good.With Cover of Lg  realy looks nice with added functions.
Abtrol it's a good product from Lg.Good to best in this price.
